items.text: I tend to bounce back quickly after a hard time or a setback.
I have a clear understanding of the emotions I am experiencing.
I easily feel overwhelmed and helpless when unexpected problems arise.
I can manage my emotions effectively even in stressful situations.
I view failures as opportunities to learn and try new approaches.
I sometimes let my emotions get the better of me and say things I regret.
When something bad happens, it takes me a long time to get over it.
I can stay calm and prioritize tasks even under heavy pressure.
I am confident in my ability to eventually solve difficult problems.
I tend to react too strongly to the moods or opinions of people around me.

R.high: You possess a 'steel mindset' that remains unbroken by challenges.
R.low: You are a sensitive and perceptive individual who deeply feels environmental changes.

E.high: You excel at self-mastery, maintaining inner peace even in turbulent times.
E.low: You are passionate and expressive, sometimes riding the waves of your emotions.
